about_the_game:
Don’t let him take what’s left of your humanity! You may not be a photographer, but you have the most extraordinary camera in your use, so you might as well learn something helpful by attending one of the exhibitions of the outstanding photographer Oliver Cook. It's quite strange since nobody had ever heard of this name before and suddenly the man became a true genius. The characters in his work really look so alive, as if they are about to step out of the frame and share a few secrets with you. Discover the secret of his unbelievable success and don't let it fade away with the appearance of ugly rumors about people disappearing in his celebrated gallery.

This Collector's Edition includes:

🧩 Realistic and Haunting Artwork!
Armed with an extraordinary camera, delve into the chilling exhibitions of the enigmatic photographer Oliver Cook, whose works are eerily lifelike. As night falls and the gallery empties, it transforms into a realm of shadows and whispers. Unravel the secrets hidden within its depths!

🧩 Diverse Array of Puzzles and Mini-Games!
Engage in a wide variety of puzzles that challenge your logical thinking and problem-solving skills. From jigsaw puzzles representing fragmented stories to code-breaking tasks hidden within haunted portraits, each game piece is crucial to piecing together the truth!

🧩 Impactful Decision-Making!
Your choices directly impact the narrative, leading to multiple endings based on how you interact with the game’s characters and solve its mysteries. Choose wisely to protect your humanity and discover all possible outcomes in this thrilling investigation!

🧩 Achievements and Rewards!
Earn achievements as you progress through hidden object games — each one commemorating your successes and the challenges you've overcome. These accolades not only mark your achievements but also enhance replayability and reward your curiosity and bravery!
